ygData.msgSnippet: Guys, come on! I agree that there may be little chance of bonding with all that, and anyways, there IS a rule against superpowerful characters. But in any

Guys, come on! I agree that there may be little chance of bonding with
all that, and anyways, there IS a rule against superpowerful
characters. But in any case, stop bashing each other for every post
you make, countless OOC insults back and forth are not fun to read.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., icedemon101@h... wrote:
> [Recon can't be bonded with them the matrixes. Bnded meaning sharing 
> with or together. which he is not so that is either another mode or a 
> lie.]
> 
> 
> 
> Angel Prime
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> "you wish Recon. you wish the elders would even give a nano second of 
> there time. Stop waisting my time. when the time comes good will 
> destroy Unicron. [he is just talking so the owner of unicron plz 
> don't take any offensce to this.] Right now you are getting on my 
> nerves. Windlord  I disagree with you. I say Burning Hammer me and 
> you kill Recon. Vulios,his friend, and Windlord kill the dragon." 
> Angel Prime fires two fireballs at Recon.
